    Reference

    One-step master function

    The master function for an arbitrary combination of genes and cancers.

    PanelPRO()

    PanelPRO master function

    One-step master function with predefined models

    Functions that takes pedigree and master database with predefined set of genes and cancers.

    Pedigree Checks and Age Imputation

    A handful of functions to check pedigree structual validity and impute missingness.

    checkFam()

    Check and make corrections to pedigree

    ageImpute()

    Impute missing ages in pedigree

    .boundAgeFromRelatives()

    Get lower and upper current age bounds for an individual

    .boundAffectionAges()

    Check and create age bound columns for cancer affection age

    .pedStructureCheck()

    Check pedigree structure and connectivity

    .checkHeredity()

    Ensure consistent hereditary features within trios

    .checkMating()

    Check a pedigree's mating structure for validity

    .checkGender()

    Ensure consistent gender information

    .checkTwins()

    Check for consistency among homozygotic twins

    .currentAgeImpute()

    Impute current age for an individual

    .cancerAgeImpute()

    Impute cancer age for an individual

    .removeDisconnected()

    Remove disconnected family members

    .findIDs()

    Find IDs of an individual's close relatives

    .getOtherRels()

    Find IDs of an individual's distant relatives

    .getAgeFromPed()

    Get current age-bounding information for an individual

    .categorize.1st.birth.age()

    converts age of 1st child birth to one of four categories

    getCBCParams()

    Get CBC model parameters for a subject.

    CBCnoncarrierCrude()

    Contralateral Breast Cancer Penetrances

    Database Preparation

    Modify master database with specified model

    PanelPRODatabase

    Built-in PanelPRO database object

    MaleCBCNoncarrierArray

    MaleCBCNoncarrierArray

    buildDatabase()

    Build model-specific database

    checkGeneCancerAssociations()

    Check for gene-cancer associations in database

    .customizeDoc()

    Prepare model-specific death by other causes

    .customizePenet()

    Prepare model-specific cancer penetrances

    .customizeRiskmod()

    Prepare model-specific risk modifier information

    .categorize.1st.birth.age()

    converts age of 1st child birth to one of four categories

    getCBCParams()

    Get CBC model parameters for a subject.

    CBCnoncarrierCrude()

    Contralateral Breast Cancer Penetrances

    Genotyping and Risk prediction

    Calculation of posterior probability of germline mutations and future risk

    PanelPROCalc()

    Calculate and format carrier probabilities and future risks

    pp.peelingParing()

    Run peeling and paring algorithm

    .calPostProb()

    Calculate Posterior Probability

    visRisk()

    Mutation probability and future cancer risk plots

    .peelingParing()

    Peeling and Paring

    germlineContrib()

    Modify likelihood using germline testing results

    markerContrib()

    Modify likelihood using tumor biomarker testing results

    calc.rr.bcrat()

    Calculate BCRAT relative risks

    calcCancerDens()

    Calculate an individual's cancer density probabilities

    calcCancerPenetrance()

    Calculate penetrances

    calcCancerSurv()

    Calculate an individual's cancer survival probabilities

    calcFutureRisk()

    Calculate future risk

    calcLik()

    Calculate likelihood

    subsetCancerPenetrance()

    Subset penetrances

    .twinsLikMod()

    Modify likelihood for identical twins/multiple births

    .calAntProb()

    Calculate Anterior Probability

    .calInheritanceProb()

    Inheritance probability from genotypes

    .calPrevalences()

    Compute prevalences for each admissible Genotype

    .ppChildMatrix()

    Create a 3D array that links each individual to their parents

    .ppEdgeMatrix()

    Create a matrix that links each individual to their mate(s)

    .ppInitializeA()

    Initialize matrix to store anterior information

    .ppInitializeP()

    Initialize 3D array to store posterior information

    .ppPossibleGenotypes()

    Get possible genotypes

    fr.cbc()

    Calculate Future Risk of Contralateral Breast Cancer (CBC)

    Misc

    Miscellaneous functions and variables

    adrop_one()

    Drop array dimensions that have only one level

    AgeDistribution

    Empirical age distributions used for age imputation

    ALL_GENE_VARIANT_TYPES

    Mapping of genes to supported variants

    ANCESTRY_TYPES

    Currently supported ancestry types

    CANCER_NAME_MAP

    Mapping of short and long cancer names

    CANCER_TYPES

    Currently supported cancer types

    CBC_GENE_TYPES

    Genes with contralateral breast cancer associations

    check.inputs.bcrat()

    Check validity of BCRAT covariates

    condense()

    Condenses three riskmod and three interAge columns into one riskmod and one interAge column.

    DEFAULT_VARIANTS

    Default variants to use

    .firstDegreeRelative()

    Find the indices of the first-degree relatives of a given individual in a pedigree

    .fix_gender_cancer()

    Correct inconsistencies between individual sex and cancer

    .forceFalse()

    Force NA to be FALSE

    .getCancersFromFam()

    Extract the cancers from the column names of a pedigree data frame

    .getChildrenIdxs()

    getChildrenIdxs

    .getFatherIdx()

    getFatherIdx

    .getMatesIdxs()

    getMatesIdxs

    .getMotherIdx()

    getMotherIdx

    .getOtherMatesIdxs()

    getOtherMatesIdxs

    .getPossibleGenotype()

    Get possible genotypes

    .getSibsIdxs()

    getSibsIdxs

    .getSpouses()

    Find IDs of an individual's spouses

    .ifContains()

    Identifies values that are not allowed in a vector

    .mapCancerNames()

    Convert cancer short names to long names or vice versa

    .mapDict()

    Base function used to map values using a dictionary

    .mapGenderNames()

    Convert between numeric-valued sex and character-valued sex

    .parallelCalc()

    Calculate carrier probabilities and future risks for a single age imputation

    .safeGet()

    Evaluate function while ignoring NA and another predefined value

    .secondDegreeRelative()

    Find the indices of the second-degree relatives of a given individual in a pedigree

    fix_with_rep()

    Replace values with another value (NA by default)

    forcingNA_ifnot_contains()

    Ensure that pedigree data frame column only contains allowed values

    formatGeneNames()

    Format gene names

    GENE_TYPES

    Currently supported gene types

    get_rand_state()

    Get the random state

    get_relation_list()

    Get list of relationships from a pedigree

    HOMOZYGOUS_VARIANT_TYPES

    Genes with homozygous and heterozygous mutation variants

    log.rr.bcrat

    Coefficients in BCRAT relative risk model

    MARKER_TESTING

    Currently supported marker testing

    MAXAGE

    Maximum age

    MODELPARAMS

    Model specification of genes and cancers for pre-defined models

    PENET_TYPES

    Currently supported penetrance types

    postIntervHR()

    Modify individual cancer penetrances using a hazard ratio

    postIntervRR()

    Modify individual cancer penetrances using a relative risk

    RACE_TYPES

    Currently supported race types

    recode(<inputs.bcrat>)

    Recode BCRAT covariates

    RISKMODS

    Currently supported risk modifiers

    riskmod_perfam()

    Modify cancer penetrances based on hazard ratios or relative risks for interventions

    rr.ref

    Race-specific estimates of 1 / (1 - population attributable risk)

    safe_apply()

    Apply function that can safely accept a vector

    set_rand_state()

    Set a random state

    SEX_TYPES

    Currently supported sex types

    subset_array()

    Subset array by a dimension of choice and optionally reduce that dimension

    UNKNOWN_ANCESTRY

    Default ancestry when missing from pedigree

    UNKNOWN_RACE

    Default race when missing from pedigree
